articles.title: Massive price drop on Vivo's color changing phone! Get Rs. 19000 off on Vivo V23 5G - HT Tech
articles.description: Flipkart is giving away attractive discounts and exchange value on Vivo V23 5G. Know how you can avail it.
articles.content: Loved Vivo's color changing phone Vivo V23 5g? If yes, then we have brought some good news for you. Vivo has announced an attractive deal on Flipkart making the Vivo V23 5G cheaper by Rs. 19000. Yes,… [+1560 chars]
